meanings.definition: A person who acts foolishly or recklessly.
meanings.sent1: That damnfool always makes silly decisions.
meanings.sent2: Don't be a damnfool and jump off that cliff!
meanings.sent3: The damnfool thought it was a good idea to pet a wild bear.
meanings.sent4: He's a real damnfool, thinking he can outsmart nature.
meanings.sent5: The town remembered him as the biggest damnfool around.

meanings.definition: To behave in a foolish or reckless manner.
meanings.sent1: She damnfools around without thinking of the consequences.
meanings.sent2: Please don't damnfool with fire, it's dangerous.
meanings.sent3: He damnfools his way through life, never learning from mistakes.
meanings.sent4: The driver damnfooled through traffic, causing chaos.
meanings.sent5: They damnfool their way into trouble every time.
